understanding: Update the page numbering on all slides so that the denominator in the page number fraction reflects the correct total number of slides (31), instead of the incorrect value 28. The slide number fraction format should be 'current page/31' on each slide.

tasks.description: Correct the denominator of the page number fraction to 31
tasks.target: Footer section of slide 1 (page number area)
